extendedInfo.description: Homeopathy is an application of kind dictionary allowing to reference a set of practical and public information relative to homeopathy. It does not aim to cure you or to supply you a prescription but to enlarge your basic knowledge on the homeopathic medicine for the common diseases.Homeopathy is more than a therapeutic but also a way of thinking that brings us closer to nature.This dictionary provides an initiation to homeopathic terms.It contains more than 300 referenced homeopathic remedies related to more than 190 symptoms.Fast in its grip and its use.FLEXIBLE :An action bar with all the management functions of your dictionary- quickly create favorite reading.- quick and complete search on Summary and Description fields. Search from words but also intuitive search from characters (intuitive search).- Sending of the homeopathicâs file content by email.-Button automatic translation from Google Translate files for users who are not French. WARNING this feature doesn't work anymore. I search another solution for the translation.USEFUL :- more than 300 homeopathic remedies referenced (339).- 190 symptoms referenced- The ability to create its own Â« Favorites Â» to instantly find a file remedy or symptom file.- portrait mode or landscape mode if necessary to obtain approval for additional reading

reviews.title: Very good app!
reviews.comment: This app replaces advantageously my big homeopathic dictionary for fast substance information; It would be perfect if the list included nosodes and opotherapic substances!
reviews.author: Bigturt Dan

reviews.title: End Francais?
reviews.comment: Nice application...but the fact that it is completely IN FRENCH would be nice to know!
reviews.author: Glen DeShaw
